Okay I have had it

Everyone please shut the fuck up

Joshua, if your dog really did die, I'm sorry, I understand that's terrible for you, but not everyone has to sympathize for you, if they don't know you or your dog


Masquerade, do not egg him on, as is him immature typing is frustrating to deal with



I am tired of this conversation
It needs to end

Please
